author: WilB
description:
Feature rich media library viewer for foobar2000.

• Tree viewer
• Album art browser
• New facets
• Statistics
• Album art flow mode

For guidance on setting up new facets / multiple panel mode, see help on views tab

Credits

• Original Jscript library search (2013): thanhdat1710
• Original JS smooth browser design (2015): Br3tt (aka falstaff)
name: Library Tree
